quote: Always re-invent yourself. Always try new things; new food, new hobbies, meet new people. That will keep your life from becoming stagnant and boring. And you will have a lot more fun!
quote_letters: ALWAYS RE-INVENT YOURSELF ALWAYS TRY NEW THINGS NEW FOOD NEW HOBBIES MEET NEW PEOPLE THAT WILL KEEP YOUR LIFE FROM BECOMING STAGNANT AND BORING AND YOU WILL HAVE A LOT MORE FUN
